text: Census and Ransom of Firstborn. The LORD then said to Moses: Enroll every firstborn male of the Israelites a month old or more, and count the number of their names.
Setting out with their whole force, they came and pitched their camp near Emmaus in the plain.
This was how the matter concerning Heliodorus and the preservation of the treasury turned out.
Let us search and examine our ways, and return to the LORD!
So let our sacrifice be in your presence today and find favor before you; for those who trust in you cannot be put to shame.
